name: legacy-fe-candidate-assignment
description: React + Dynamic.xyz Headless Implementation (Frontend) | Node.js + Express (Backend)

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "fe,be" -c "cyan,magenta" "npm run dev --workspace fe" "npm run dev --workspace be"
scripts.build: concurrently -n "fe,be" -c "cyan,magenta" "npm run build --workspace fe" "npm run build --workspace be"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "fe,be" -c "cyan,magenta" "npm run start --workspace fe" "npm run start --workspace be"
scripts.test: concurrently -n "fe,be" -c "cyan,magenta" "npm run test --workspace fe" "npm run test --workspace be"
